definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="controls_if" x="496" y="-50"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="world_data_isremote"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="explode"><field name="mode">NONE</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value></block></statement></block><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">block.nether_bricks.fall</field><field name="soundcategory">ambient</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1.5</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.7</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.4</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
